assent.translation[0].definitions[0].def: approval or agreement from someone who has authority
assent.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the assent of the Board of Governors
Parliament gave its assent to war.
assent.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to agree to a suggestion, idea etc after considering it carefully
assent.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: They assented to his request to work from home.
assent.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: Any such decision would require the assent of two thirds of shareholders.
